Bio.

A little more about me.

I hail from New Delhi, India. Currently working at a start-up as Deep Learning Engineer.
I specialize in implementing Neural Networks

Some of my Projects.

Python, Keras, Ensembling

Kaggle Melanoma Challenge

Identify melanoma in images of skin lesions. In particular, using images of the same patient and determine which are likely to represent a melanoma.

Python, Keras, CNN

Salt detection Challenge

Build an algorithm that automatically and accurately identifies if a subsurface target is
salt or not.

Python, NLP, Machine Translation

Sentiment Classification

Sentiment classification is the task of looking at a piece of text and telling if someone likes or
dislikes the thing theyâ€™re talking about.

Python, LSTM, Tensorflow

Generating Texts

Generate new text one character at a time using LSTM's, but training the model on huge corpus of data.
